skfp.fingerprints.E3FPFingerprint¶

class skfp.fingerprints.E3FPFingerprint(fp_size: int = 1024, n_bits_before_hash: int = 4096, radius_multiplier: float = 1.5, rdkit_invariants: bool = True, num_conf_generated: int = 3, num_conf_used: int = 1, pool_multiplier: float = 1, rmsd_cutoff: float = 0.5, max_energy_diff: float = None, force_field: float = 'uff', get_values: bool = True, aggregation_type: str = 'min_energy', sparse: bool = False, n_jobs: int | None = None, verbose: int = 0, random_state: int = 0)¶
